content: World-famous for its oaky chardonnays, fruity merlots, and rich cabernets, the areas surrounding the towns of St. Helena, Napa, Calistoga, and Yountville are overflowing with good wine. That said, the Wine Country Inn & Cottages staff will arrange visits to local wineries, wine tours and rides on the Napa Valley Wine Train, which are most popular — and most recommended — attractions in the region.
